backend/main.mo: IC canister implementing user profiles and restaurant data with access‑controlled CRUD for profiles, categories, items, gallery, and restaurant profile.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module returning state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Breakfast‑removal features, their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining warm color palette and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑ready HTML entry with manifest link, theme color, metadata, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, display mode, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install/activate handlers and network‑first or cache‑first strategies for PWA offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling section navigation, auth profile setup, and service worker registration.
Admin auth guard that blocks access for unauthenticated or non‑admin users.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Tabbed admin dashboard for editing profile, menu, and gallery content behind AdminGate.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Fetches and manages gallery images, providing UI for adding, editing, and deleting metadata via dialogs and cards.
frontend/src/components/admin/MenuEditor: Loads menu categories and items and provides dialogs and cards to create, edit, and delete categories and menu items.
frontend/src/components/admin/Restaurant: Displays and edits restaurant profile fields, syncing initial data from the backend and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout state and displays a button reflecting authentication status.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new users for their name and submits it to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Provides responsive navigation with section switching, admin visibility checks, and login integration.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Shows contact details including owner info and a phone number, using backend data with fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays gallery images from backend or defaults and provides a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/components/sections/Locatio: Shows restaurant location details with address, map link, and a location card layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/MenuSec: Loads menu categories and items, filters out breakfast, supports search, and displays categorized menu cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Renders a hero section and feature cards summarizing restaurant highlights and basic info.
frontend/src/data/menuSeed.ts: Provides fallback seed data for menu categories and items used when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, restaurant profiles, and menu categories with mutations that invalidate relevant query caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker in production, logs updates, and handles install state changes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radius, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata and feature requests centered on removing breakfast-related menu data and behavior.
